terms.सुमेरूः (sumerūḥ): Mount Sumeru (a mythical mountain considered as the center of the universe)
terms.वह्न: यशनात् (vahna-yaśanāt) - because of fire's consuming effect

meaning: Meaning:Even at the root of the great Mount Sumeru, which is considered as the center of the universe, drinking water is still required. Similarly, even though fire has the power to consume anything, control over the mind is a difficult task.
